To<WG2532> the Jews<WG2453> I became<WG1096> as<WG5613> a Jew,<WG2453> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> Jews;<WG2453> to those who are<WG3588> under<WG5259> the law,<WG3551> as<WG5613> under<WG5259> the law,<WG3551> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> those who are<WG3588> under<WG5259> the law;<WG3551>

to those who are without law,<WG459> as<WG5613> without law<WG459> (not<WG3361> being<WG5607> without law<WG459> toward God,<WG2316> but<WG235> under law<WG1772> toward Christ<WG5547>), that<WG2443> I might win<WG2770> those who are without law.<WG459>

To the weak<WG772> I<WG1096> became as<WG5613> weak,<WG772> that<WG2443> I might gain<WG2770> the weak.<WG772> I have become<WG1096> all things<WG3956> to all<WG3956> men,<WG2443> that I may<WG4982> by all means<WG3843> save<WG4982> some.<WG5100>
Now<WG1161> I do<WG4160> this<WG5124> for<WG1223> the sake<WG2098> of the Good News,<WG2443> that I may be<WG1096> a joint<WG846> partaker of it.<WG4791>
